description:
THIS UPDATE FIXES SUPPORT FOR uTorrent 3.0!

TorrentTouch Pro HD allows you to connect to uTorrent and/or Transmission to view and control your torrents. Torrents can be stopped, resumed, and removed (torrent only or torrent & data), and you can add new torrents (by url and by in-app search). 

Please Note: This application does not actually handle downloading the torrents...you must have a uTorrent and/or Transmission installation on a computer with access to the WebUI interface already set up (see http://rjamdev.info/?page_id=207 for help setting this up).
